headline: CELEBRITY CRUISES IS OFFERING MORE WAYS TO EXPLORE THE CARIBBEAN, ASIA AND SOUTH AMERICA WITH UNFORGETTABLE 2027-2028 VACATIONS
summary: Guests can discover something new in every corner of the world, as Celebrity Cruises unveils its 2027 and 2028 itineraries in the Caribbean, Asia and South America. Sailings across these three continents will take guests on spectacular voyages to 131 destinations across 42 countries, while unique ports and overnight stays offer unforgettable experiences. Celebrity's newest ship, Celebrity Xcel, returns to the Caribbean for a third season, once again offering guests an immersive connection to the
